sentences.en: a bench fashioned out of a fallen tree trunk.
sentences.cn: 用倒伏的树干做的长凳。

sentences.en: Any head teacher who made errors like this would be chucked out.
sentences.cn: 哪个校长只要犯了这样的错误都会被开除。

sentences.en: Barry had his nose put out of joint by Lucy's aloof sophistication.
sentences.cn: 露西的冷淡与世故使得巴里十分不快。

sentences.en: Before the race, he is fine. But afterwards he is worn out.
sentences.cn: 赛前他状态很好，赛后就筋疲力尽了。

sentences.en: Brrr, it’s cold out there.
sentences.cn: 呵，外面好冷啊。

sentences.en: Charlotte went to the window and looked out.
sentences.cn: 夏洛特走到窗前往外看。

sentences.en: Children were out playing in the snow.
sentences.cn: 孩子们在外面雪中玩耍。

sentences.en: Don't worry. We'll have you out of here double-quick.
sentences.cn: 别担心，我们会很快把你从这儿弄出去的。

sentences.en: he came out of prison.
sentences.cn: 他出狱了。

sentences.en: He did not like to be caught out on details.
sentences.cn: 他不喜欢在细节上被人抓住把柄。

sentences.en: He got out of bed and pulled on his bathrobe.
sentences.cn: 他起床后穿上了晨衣。

sentences.en: He talks quite slowly and spaces his words out.
sentences.cn: 他说得很慢，每个词之间都有停顿。

sentences.en: he was out for a good time.
sentences.cn: 他一心想好好尽兴。

sentences.en: He went out to New Zealand.
sentences.cn: 他远赴新西兰。

sentences.en: I hate feeling out of it.
sentences.cn: 我不喜欢感到是局外人。

sentences.en: Lock the door on your way out.
sentences.cn: 你出去时把门锁上。

sentences.en: Many of the homeless have been sleeping out for years.
sentences.cn: 许多无家可归者常年露宿街头。

sentences.en: nine times out of ten.
sentences.cn: 十之八九。

sentences.en: Out you go (= used to order someone to leave a room )!
sentences.cn: 你给我出去！

sentences.en: She opened her suitcase and took out a pair of shoes.
sentences.cn: 她打开手提箱，拿出一双鞋。

sentences.en: still not a word out of Pearsall.
sentences.cn: 皮尔塞耳仍然什么也不说。

sentences.en: The airline had losses of $35m and was bailed out by Qantas.
sentences.cn: 这家航空公司亏损达3,500万美元，而澳航出资帮助其摆脱了困境。

sentences.en: The building he was lodged in turned out to be a church.
sentences.cn: 原来，他租住的那栋建筑是一座教堂。

sentences.en: The crowds had been soaked and were now nicely drying out.
sentences.cn: 这群人都浑身湿透，现在谢天谢地快晾干了。

sentences.en: The indisputable fact is that computers carry out logical operations.
sentences.cn: 不容置疑的事实是，电脑执行逻辑操作指令。

sentences.en: The light went out, and the room was plunged into darkness.
sentences.cn: 灯熄了，屋里陷入一片漆黑。

sentences.en: The road to peace will be long and drawn-out.
sentences.cn: 通往和平的道路将很漫长。

sentences.en: The three parties will meet next month to work out remaining differences.
sentences.cn: 三方将在下个月会面，以解决余下的分歧。

sentences.en: they had run out of cash.
sentences.cn: 他们用完了现金。

sentences.en: they were out to impress.
sentences.cn: 他们竭力表现自己。

sentences.en: They will not allow your more way-out ideas to pass unchallenged.
sentences.cn: 他们不会放过你这些古怪的念头的。

sentences.en: They’ve rented a farmhouse right out in the country.
sentences.cn: 他们在偏僻的乡下租了一间农舍。

sentences.en: When the sun came out, a rainbow formed in the sky.
sentences.cn: 太阳出来时，天空中出现了一道彩虹。

sentences.en: you were &B{at outs with} my uncle Ned.
sentences.cn: 你与我的奈德叔叔不和。

words.tran_cn: 外面的，外部的；远离中心的
最远的；最外面的；最高头的
向外的；外面的；公开的；外服的；肉体的
向外（等于outwards）；在外；显而易见地
远足；短途旅游；体育比赛
显现出来,明显地,公开地
在野党,遗弃物,被抛弃的人

phrases.tran_cn: 无礼的：不友好的；持不同意见的
（人，尤指生病后的人）能正常走动的

phrases.phrase: out of it informal 非正式

phrases.tran_cn: 决心做某事，力图做某事

trans.tran_cn: 出局，在外，在外部，完全，彻底，出版
trans.tran_en: from inside an object, container, building, or place
an act of making a player in baseball lose the chance to score a point

trans.tran_cn: （表示来源）从，（从…里）出来，（表示不在原状态）脱离，离去
trans.tran_en: from the inside to the outside of something – many teachers of British English consider it incorrect to use ‘out’ as a preposition
from inside an object, container, building, or place
